mapper.insert: insert into loa_npc (NPC_name, nomal, interest, friendship, turst, NPC_region, writer) values (#{NPC_name}, #{nomal}, #{interest},#{friendship},#{turst},#{NPC_region},#{writer})
mapper.update: update loa_npc set NPC_name = #{NPC_name}, nomal=#{nomal}, interest=#{interest}, friendship=#{friendship}, turst=#{turst}, NPC_region=#{NPC_region}, writer=#{writer} where npc_num=#{npc_num}
mapper.select: Select count(NPC_name) from loa_npc where NPC_name=#{name}
select * from loa_npc where NPC_name like #{search}
select * from loa_npc where npc_num>0 order by npc_num asc limit #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum}
select count(npc_num) from loa_npc where npc_num>0
